summary: An email from FBI CID to FBI NY regarding intelligence sharing from the UK's National Crime Agency (NCA) about Jeffrey Epstein. It references an attached document, asks about potential conflicts with an NSPCC investigation into Care Iveagh, and mentions NCA having financial intelligence on Epstein's U.S. bank account.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses intelligence and financial information related to Epstein, indicating he is the central subject of the investigation.

events.title: FBI email regarding Epstein intelligence
events.description: An email is sent from FBI CID to FBI NY coordinating on intelligence received from the UK's National Crime Agency (NCA) concerning Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The UK's National Crime Agency (NCA) provided intelligence on Jeffrey Epstein to the FBI.
The FBI is inquiring if an internal NSPCC investigation into 'Care Iveagh' would adversely affect the FBI's Epstein investigation.
NCA possesses financial intelligence regarding a U.S. bank account associated with Epstein and offered to route it via FinCEN.
